news.headline: Adani Enterprises Q4 FY25 Net Profit Surges 752% to ₹3,845 Crore
news.text: Adani Enterprises reported a consolidated net profit of ₹3,845 crore for Q4 FY25, marking a 752% year-on-year increase. This surge was primarily due to an exceptional gain of ₹3,286 crore from the sale of a 13.5% stake in Adani Wilmar. Excluding this one-time gain, the profit still rose by 24% YoY. However, revenue from operations declined by 8% to ₹26,966 crore, mainly due to a 38% drop in volumes in the Integrated Resources Management segment.

news.headline: Adani Enterprises Declares Final Dividend of ₹1.30 per Share for FY25
news.text: The board of Adani Enterprises has recommended a final dividend of ₹1.30 per equity share for the financial year 2024-25. The record date for determining eligible shareholders is June 13, 2025, with the dividend expected to be paid on or after June 27, 2025.

news.headline: Adani Enterprises' FY25 Revenue Rises 2% to ₹1 Lakh Crore
news.text: For the full fiscal year 2024-25, Adani Enterprises reported a 2% increase in consolidated revenue, reaching ₹1 lakh crore. EBITDA for the year grew by 26% to ₹16,722 crore, driven by strong performance in its green energy, airports, and infrastructure businesses. Net profit more than doubled to ₹7,112 crore, reflecting the company's diversified growth strategy.

news.headline: Adani Enterprises Share Price Climbs 7% Amid Positive Earnings
news.text: On May 12, 2025, Adani Enterprises' share price rose by 7.3%, trading at ₹2,415.10. The stock's upward movement is attributed to the company's strong Q4 FY25 earnings. Despite this gain, the stock has experienced a 13.48% decline over the past year, highlighting ongoing market volatility.
